title: Extra Supports in Free Champion Rotation

replies.body: So we still don't have the new draft right? So what's the point of even doing this on OCE in the first place?
No point not doing it. More free champions in rotation isn't a bad thing :D
BRAND IS NOt A SUPPORT RIOT ARE YOU DUMB

If you think Brand isn't a support, you're not burning stuff properly.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
wah??{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
lol u aint the only fresh thing here

> [{quoted}](name=FreshWatermelon,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=M96uEnTL,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-11-19T07:17:25.778+0000)
>
> lol u aint the only fresh thing here

homework is better fresh
brand support logic, they cant harm the adc if they are dead, srsly tho, it kinda works, but, eh, its more like free dmg without any supportive power
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  Keep on thinking that.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Feel like Riot needs to make more supp champs... jussayin'.

But I main support like {{champion:412}},{{champion:53}} 
RITO WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY?

Hopefully after this, more people will appreciate what a support actually does to carry a game and give back some of the glory they deserve when they outplay the opposing laners and incoming ganks / dives to create the game ending monster you call the Fed ADC.
To all you Bronze Vs in the chat, Brand is a viable support ;)
The extra supports are screwing up aram. Every game is a stomp by the team that didn't get all supports. Riot, please disable the extra supports in aram.
Just a question, How will this improve queue times and convince people to pick support or fill if rotation champions aren't even available in ranked???? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
oml hi do you remember me
Where is my comments i posted last night ?????
Sooooo what your'e saying is, Cass support?? Yah?
meanwhile not talking about soraka or karma bieng in the support rotation but brand is
They must have made a mistake cause BRAND IS NOT A SUPPORT
Brand. is. not. a. SUPPORT!
Brand a support??? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
